title: Messages From The Angelic Realms
description: Messages From The Angelic Realms is a collection of channeled messages delivered by Amanda J Evans. These messages have been channeled to bring hope, faith and happiness to the world. These inspirational messages have been channeled to prove to the world that there are angels around us all, waiting to be asked for help. The inspirational messages contained in this book can help you to change you life. These messages provide the confidence and courage needed to take the next step forward so that humanity can create the world they desire.
author: Amanda J. Evans
